title: Angotia Map Creator
content: Tool for game developers or Map Creators to creating fully functionally 2D game maps and characters.

title: Bread Hunter 4
content: Bread Hunter 4 is arcade game where u need to be as speed as u can, catch all breds and don't be catched by Katl cashier!

title: Poyters
content: Single page application created in Angular with possibility to create Poyters Account - gives acces to private Poyters products

title: HIPER JUMPER 2000
content: HIPER JUMPER 2000 arcade game withhand-coded physic engine and map creator.

title: Space newcomers
content: Space newcomers is Poyters version of famous game - Space Invaders created by Taito Corporation in 1978.

title: Kostek 'Birthday'
content: Kostek 'Birthday' is a comedy game where nothingis predictable. Just join it and make laught!
